channel.title: Some of the Sounds are skipping in flite controller – Politepix

item.title: Some of the Sounds are skipping in flite controller
item.dc:creator: Richa Kumar
item.description:
Hi,
I am using OpenEars framework with one voice (slt).
The filte controller plays some sounds and skips some sounds.Please help

item.title: Reply To: Some of the Sounds are skipping in flite controller
item.dc:creator: Richa Kumar
item.description: Loading speech data for Flite concluded successfully is not being called for some words

item.title: Reply To: Some of the Sounds are skipping in flite controller
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

This usually happens if you make one speech call after another without letting the first one finish before calling the next one. Go ahead and show your code if you’d like assistance.
